publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4969 Donald Gorrie: Targeting of Alcohol Treatment Servicesâ€”That the Parliament agrees to press for more and better-focused information to be provided about people currently engaging with alcohol treatment agencies and about these agencies and their services in order to enable future services to be targeted to deal with the unmet demand for services relating to alcohol.
S2M-4969 Targeting of Alcohol Treatment Services (lodged on 18 October 2006) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-4969 Targeting of Alcohol Treatment Services (lodged on 18 October 2006) Rob Gibson*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mike Pringle*, Brian Adam*, Carolyn Leckie*
S2M-4969 Targeting of Alcohol Treatment Services (lodged on 18 October 2006) Robin Harper*
S2M-4969 Targeting of Alcohol Treatment Services (lodged on 18 October 2006) Patrick Harvie*
S2M-4969 Targeting of Alcohol Treatment Services (lodged on 18 October 2006) Mr Jamie Stone*
